jobDescription: What we do Customer Portfolios is a marketing technology leader that empowers its global retail clients to maximize the value of each customer. Who we are The Customer Portfolios team of analytical and marketing experts help companies like Johnston & Murphy, Vera Bradley, Journeys, Frye, Tourneau, and many more consistently drive revenue growth and increased customer lifetime value. Visit www.customerportfolios.com, read our blog and follow us on Twitter and LinkedIn.
